SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CONNECTION_LOGGING
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Session name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_OSB_SESSION_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!-------------------------------------Create WLST activate session command with arguments------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! set AGENT working directory : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
: SET &PYTHON_FILE_NAME# = "DISCARD_SESSION" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_PYTHON
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
! SESSION NAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &TEMP_OPTION_VALUE# = &UC4RB_OSB_SESSION_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_DISCARD_SESSION_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONNECT_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_OSB_ESC_VALUE#"')
! printing the command formed : PRINT &UC4RB_DISCARD_SESSION_CMD#
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.OSB_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( &UC4RB_DISCARD_SESSION_CMD# ERROR=%ERRORLEVEL% ) : CASE "UNIX" if [ $error -eq 0 ] then &UC4RB_DISCARD_SESSION_CMD# error=$? fi
: OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** DISCARD SESSION ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** DISCARD SESSION ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_OSB.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
